title: Associate Professor
department: Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences
research_focus_description: Jennifer Stevens' research explores neuroimaging approaches to understanding brain function, particularly neural circuits affecting emotional arousal and memory related to trauma. Her work investigates stress vulnerability, resilience, sex differences in emotion-related brain function, and the neural basis of trauma-related psychopathology.
link_to_bio: Not explicitly provided, but information suggests a potential bio available with Emory University School of Medicine or the Grady Trauma Project.
